meanings.sent1: She is bringing her favorite book to school.
meanings.sent2: I am bringing snacks for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: Bringing a smile to her face, the surprise gift was well received.
meanings.sent4: His speech was so inspiring, bringing hope to everyone who listened.
meanings.sent5: The colorful decorations are bringing life to the party.

meanings.definition: The act of carrying or conveying something to a place.
meanings.sent1: The bringing of groceries from the store was tiring.
meanings.sent2: His bringing of the heavy boxes impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The bringing of the oversized cake caused laughter at the party.
meanings.sent4: The bringing of good news lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The bringing of the new exhibit to the museum was a success.
